failure.message:
waitUntil condition failed with the following reason: Wrong parameters applied for getElementText Usage: getElementText(elementId)
Property Description: "elementId" (string): the id of an element returned in a previous call to Find Element(s)
For more info see https://w3c.github.io/webdriver/#dfn-get-element-text
